                        GameManager gameManager,

        method to start the effect of a powerUp
        Parameters:
        powerUp - the powerUp used
        gameManager - the game in which the action has been made
        player - the player that's playing the powerUp

                                Player player,
                                PlayerView targetPlayer)
                         throws GameException
        method used when the player selects a target in a powerUp effect
        Parameters:

        gameManager - the game the player is in
        player - the player that's using the powerUp
        targetPlayer - the PlayerView selected
        Throws:
